extends javax.swing.text.DefaultFormatter

      • stringToValue

        public java.lang.Object stringToValue(java.lang.String string)
                               throws java.text.ParseException
        Overrides stringToValue() from java.swing.text.DefaultFormatter
        Overrides:
        stringToValue in class javax.swing.text.DefaultFormatter
        Parameters:
        string - The string to be converted to Object
        Returns:
        If a pattern is not set, String parameter is returned. If a pattern is set and matches string, the DefaultFormatter.stringToValue() is returned, otherwise a ParseException is thrown.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        See Also:
        DefaultFormatter, ParseException
